history: TTS <speak> Welcome to CMU GetGoing <break time='1s' />.
TTS <speak> How would you like to travel today? <break strength='strong'/> I can give you public transit directions or driving directions. </speak>
USER public transit
TTS <speak> Great! <break strength='strong' /> I will provide you with directions to your destination by public transit. <break time='800ms'/> </speak>
TTS What is your destination?
USER will heal
TTS Did you say that you wanted to go to pittsburgh?
USER going to Squirrel Hill.
TTS Did you say that you wanted to go to squirrel hill north?
USER Yes.
TTS Where would you like to leave from?
USER Shady Athens
TTS Did you say that you were leaving from shady side academy junior school?
USER No.
TTS Where are you leaving from?
USER Casey Anthony
TTS Did you say that you were leaving from shady side academy junior school?
USER No.
TTS I am having difficulty understanding. Please try giving a nearby street corner or monument. Where would you like to leave from?
USER Shady Ave
TTS Did you say that you were leaving from shady avenue?
USER Yes.
TTS When would you like to travel?
USER the night at 11
TTS Okay, travelling at 10:46 pm.
TTS <speak> Would you like me to pause after every step to give you time to write things down? </speak>
USER no.
TTS <speak> Sounds good. <break strength='strong' /> Let me know if you didn't understand a step, and I'll repeat it for you. </speak>
TTS <speak> Hold on. I'll look up the directions. </speak>
USER yes

TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> There are 4 available routes, to hear a different route say ALTERNATE ROUTE. The amount of time your trip will take is approximately 14 minutes, and you will take 1 bus.<break time='800ms'/> The first thing that you want to do <break strength='weak'/> is to Walk for about 7 mins to <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> Wilkins avenue at Shady avenue far side. </prosody> </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Did you understand this step? </speak>
USER I'm calling from 11 p.m.
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Are you ready for the next step? </speak>
